issue.title: Stopwatch.StartStopReset test is flaky on windows

content.raw:
this one is bonkers though

~~~
59: D:\Jenkins\workspace\ignition_math-ci-pr_any-windows7-amd64\ws\ign-math\src\Stopwatch_TEST.cc(101): error: Expected: (_time.ElapsedRunTime()) >= (std::chrono::milliseconds(2000)), actual: 8-byte object <AB-70 34-77 00-00 00-00> vs 8-byte object <D0-07 00-00 00-00 00-00>
59: ElapsedRunTime 2000040 us vs 2000000 us
~~~

full context 

~~~

59: ElapsedRunTime 999874 us vs 1000000 us
59: 
59: D:\Jenkins\workspace\ignition_math-ci-pr_any-windows7-amd64\ws\ign-math\src\Stopwatch_TEST.cc(79): error: Expected: (_time.ElapsedStopTime()) >= (std::chrono::milliseconds(1000)), actual: 8-byte object <24-9F 95-3B 00-00 00-00> vs 8-byte object <E8-03 00-00 00-00 00-00>
59: ElapsedStopTime 999777 us vs 1000000 us
